text: George Clooney was recently honoured at the American Film Institute's 2018 Life Achievement Award Gala Tribute. The grand event was graced by the presence of celebrities like Jennifer Aniston, Ivan Reitman and many of Clooney’s co-stars like Don Cheadle, Anna Kendrick, Richard Kind, Juliana Margulies and Bill Murray also toasted the actor inside the Dolby Theatre in Hollywood. However, Julia Roberts was apparently missing at the special night.
title: Here's why Julia Roberts missed George Clooney's AFI Life Achievement Award Ceremony
